name: Around The Magnet
description:
You have been chosen to test our newest product - Magnets!
But these are not just ordinnary magnets.
They can...only pull marbles! Pretty cool, right? Hah!

Your goal is to transport a set amount of marbles to a safe zone (green area). Using the power of Magnet, move them around and don't let them be destroyed by obstacles. Or just don't lose control over them!

Map:

  • LMB (Left Mouse Button) on Level - Select Level
  • Hover over Level - Get level's name (stats are also shown, when this level is beaten)
  • Cursor near screen edges - Move camera

Level:

  • LMB and Hold on Magnet - Control Magnet
  • Release LMB - Drop Magnet
  • Bitowsky - Main Developer, Programming, Art
  • Pierre - Testing

  • This game was created (and abandonded) in 2021 as a experiment and revived for Project Revival Jam 2
  • This project contains music that was not created by me. Click here, to get a full list of used songs and their creators
  • "GAME BY"/"REVIVED FOR" section is the only thing added for this project. The rest is a work from 2021.
